entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
